Helix type torsion angle (wPsi_H & wPhi_H)

These two indices represent a classification of a residue as helix type according to its value of Psi and Phi respectively. Both indices are defined as follow:

Where takes value one if the corresponding psi angle is between -77º and -17º, otherwise takes cero. In the same way takes value one if the corresponding phi angle is between -87º and -27º otherwise takes cero.
